---
name: Feature request
about: Suggest an improvement or new skill
title: "[Feature]: "
labels: enhancement
---

## Summary

What would you like to see added or improved?

## Target Users

Who benefits most? (students, teachers, TAs, or all)

## Proposed Workflow

Describe how the feature would fit into study workflows.

## Skill Scope

Would this be a new skill or an update to an existing one?

## Additional Context
